juzs.text: 67|1|Barakatamaya te'om yara hatata sarbamaya kartrtba; arau te'om sakalo bastura oparata ksamatabana.
67|2|Yijane mrtyu arau jirana srsti karaiche, yate tomalokaka paraiksa karaiba parae ye, tomalokara majata kone ata'itakai uttama amala karaiba parae? Te'om paraakramasali, atiksamasila.
67|3|Yijane satakhana akasa starae starae srsti karaiche. Rahamanara srstita tumi kono trauti dekhibalai napaba; tumi akau ghurai coraa, kono trauti dekhibalai pa'ichane
67|4|tara pichata akau tumi dbitiyabara drstipata karaa, e'i drsti byartha arau klanta hai tomara phale ubhati ahiba.

67|5|Niscaya ami nikatararti akasaka pradipapunjara dbaraa susobhita karaicho arau se'iboraka cayatanasakalara prati niksepara upakarana bana'icho arau sihamtara babe prastuta karaicho jbalanta agnikundara sasti.
67|6|Arau yisakale nija pratipalakaka asbikara karaiche, sihamtara babe ache jahannamara sasti; arau kimana ye nikrsta se'i pratyarartanasthala.
67|7|Yetiya sihamtaka tata niksepa karaa ha'ba, tata sihamte iyara bikata sabda sunibalai paba. Arau i uthali uthiba.
67|8|Kraodhata i chinna-bhinna horaara upakrama ha'ba. Yetiya'i tata kono dalaka niksepa karaa ha'ba, iyara praharaisakale sihamtaka sudhiba, ‘tomalokara ocarata kono satarkakarai aha nachila ne’

67|9|sihamte ka'ba haya, 'niscaya amara ocarata satarkakarai ahichila. Tetiya ami (te'omlokaka) mithyaraopa karaichilo arau kaichilo, ‘allahe ekorae aratirna karaa na'i. Tomaloke mahabibhraantita acha’.
67|10|Arau sihamte ka'ba, ‘yadi ami sunilohemtena arau bibeka-bud'dhi prayoga karailohemtena, tente ami jbalanta ju'ira adhibasi naha'lohemtena’.
67|11|Phalata sihamte nijara aparaadha sbikara karaiba. Eteke dhbansa jbalanta ju'ira adhibasisakalara babe.
67|12|Niscaya yisakale nedekhakai nija pratipalakaka bhaya karae te'omlokara babe ache ksama arau danara pratidana.
67|13|Arau tomaloke tomalokara katha gopane koraa athaba prakasyabharae koraa, niscaya te'om antarasamuhata yi ache se'i bisaye samyaka aragata.
67|14|Yijane srsti karaiche, teraemi najanibane? Athaca te'om suksmadarsi, samyaka arahita.

67|15|Teraemi tomalokara babe prthiraikhanaka sugama karai diche, eteke tomaloke iyara patha-praantarata bicarana karaa arau te'omra jiraikara paraa tomaloke ahara karaa; arau te'omra ocarate'i punaraut'thana.
67|16|Tomaloke te'omra paraa nirbhaya haicha neki ye, yijana akasata ache te'om tomalokaka prthiraisaha (puti pela'i) dhbansa karaiba arau hathat i (prthiraikhana) thara tharakai kampibalai dharaiba

67|17|athaba tomaloke iyara paraa nirbhaya haicha neki ye, yijana akasata ache, te'om tomalokara oparata sila barsanakarai prabala dhumuha pathaba? Tetiya tomaloke janibalai paba kenekuraa achila mora satarkabani
67|18|arau niscaya sihamtara purbarartisakale'o mithyaraopa karaichila. Phalata kenekuraa achila mora pratyakhyana (iyara sasti)

67|19|sihamte sihamtara oparata (urai phuraa) caraa'iborara prati laksya karaa na'ine, yiborae pakhi meli diye arau sankucita karae? Parama karaunamaya allahe'i e'iboraka sthira karai raakhe. Niscaya te'om sakalo bastura samyaka drasta.
67|20|Parama karaunamaya allahara bahirae tomalokara ene kono sain'yabahini achene, yisakale tomalokaka sahaya karaiba? Kaphirasakala ache mathona prabancanara majata.
67|21|Kona ache enekuraa, yijane tomalokaka jiraika dana karaiba yadi te'om te'omra jiraika bandha karai diye? Baram sihamta abadhyata arau bimukhatata abicala hai ache.
67|22|Yi byakti nata hai mukhara oparata bhara di khoja karhe, siye'i adhika hidayata praapta, ne se'i byakti, yijane pona hai sarala pathata khoja karhe
67|23|koraa, teraemi tomalokaka srsti karaiche arau tomalokara babe srarana arau drstisakti lagate antahkaranasamuha pradana karaiche. Tomaloke khube'i kama krtajnata prakasa karaa.
67|24|Koraa, teraemi tomalokaka prthiraita srsti karai prasaraita karaiche arau te'omra ocarate'i tomalokaka samabeta karaa ha'ba.
67|25|Arau sihamte kaya, 'tomaloke yadi satyabadi horaa tente koraacona e'i pratisrauti ketiya bastabayita ha’ba'?.
67|26|Koraa, e'i bisayara jnana kerala allahara ocarate'i ache. Arau ma'ito kerala spasta satarkakarai matra.
67|27|Tara pichata yetiya sihamte iyaka nice'i ocarata dekha paba tetiya kaphirasakalara ceharaa mlana hai paraiba arau koraa ha’ba, ‘e'itorae'i haiche se'ito, yito tomaloke dabi karaichila’.

67|28|Koraa, koraacona tomaloke.. Yadi allahe moka arau mora sangisakalaka dhbansa karai diye athaba amara prati daya pradarsana karae, tente kaphirasakalaka yantranadayaka sastira paraa kone raksa karaiba
67|29|koraa, teraemi parama karaunamaya. Ami te'omra oparate'i imana anicho arau te'omra oparate'i bharasa karaicho. Gatike tomaloke anatipalame janibalai paba kone spasta bibhraantita ache.
67|30|Koraa, tomaloke bhabichane, yadi tomalokara pani bhugarbhata guci yaya, tetiya kone tomalokaka prabahamana pani ani diba
68|1|nuna; kalamara sapata arau sihamte yi likhe tara sapata
68|2|tomara pratipalakara anugraha ye, tumi unmada nahaya.
68|3|Arau niscaya tomara babe ache nirabicchinna puraskara.
68|4|Arau niscaya tumi mahana caraitrara ucca srngata adhisthita.
68|5|Eteke anatipalame tumi dekhibalai paba arau sihamte'o dekhibalai paba
68|6|tomalokara majata kona bikaragrastha
68|7|niscaya tomara pratipalaka samyaka aragata sihamtara bisaye yihamte te'omra pathara paraa bicyuta haiche, arau te'om hidayata praaptasakalara bisaye'o samyaka paraijnata.
68|8|Gatike tumi mithyaraopakaraisakalara anugatya nakaraiba.
68|9|Sihamte kamana karae ye, tumi aposakami horaa, tente sihamte'o aposakami ha'ba.
68|10|Arau tumi anugatya nakaraiba pratyeka ene byaktira yiye adhika sapatakarai, lanchita
68|11|pithira amrata nindakarai arau yijana cogalakhurai karai phurae
68|12|Kalyanara kamata badha pradanakarai, simalanghanakarai, papistha
68|13|dusta prakrtira, taduparai kukhyata
68|14|e'i babe'i ye, si achila dhana-sampada arau santana-santatira adhikarai.
68|15|Yetiya tara ocarata amara ayatasamuha tilaraata karaa haya tetiya si kaya, e'ibora purbarartisakalara kalpa-kahini matra.
68|16|Ati sighrae ami tara surata (nakata) daga dima.
68|17|Niscaya ami ihamtaka paraiksa karaicho, yenekai paraiksa karaichilo udyana-adhipatisakalaka, yetiya sihamte sapata karaichila ye, arasye raatipuraa'i sihamte baganara phala aharana karaiba.
68|18|Arau sihamte ‘ina sba allaha’ koraa nachila.
68|19|Seye tomara pratipalakara ocarara paraa eta pradaksinakarai (biparyaya, ju'i) baganara oparata pradaksina karaile, se'i samayata sihamta achila topanita.
68|20|Phalata i (ju'i lagi) kalabarnara nicina hai ga’la.
68|21|Raatipuraa'i sihamte ijane sijanaka mati ka’le
68|22|‘yadi tomaloke phala aharana karaiba bicaraa teneha’le purati nisa'i tomalokara baganalai yoraa’.
68|23|Tara pichata sihamte yabalai dharaile, arau nimnasbarae e'i katha kai achila
68|24|ye ‘aji tata tomalokara ocarata yate kono dukhiya-abharai praraesa karaiba noraarae’.
68|25|Arau sihamte purati nisa'i drrha iccha sakti lai saksama arasthata (baganalai) yatraa karaile.
68|26|Tara pichata sihamte yetiya baganakhana dekhibalai pale, tetiya sihamte ka’le, ‘niscaya patha herauraa'icho’.
68|27|‘Baram ami bancita’.
68|28|Sihamtara majara sraestha byaktijane ka’le, ‘ma'i tomalokaka koraa nachilone ye, tomaloke kiya allahara paraitrata arau mahima ghosana nakaraa’
68|29|sihamte ka’le, ‘ami amara pratipalakara paraitrata ghosana karaom. Niscaya ami yalima achilo’.
68|30|Tara pichata sihamte ijane sijanaka dosaraopa karaibalai dharaile.
68|31|Sihamte ka’le, ‘haya, amara dhbansa! Niscaya ami simalanghanakarai achilo’.
68|32|Sambharatah amara pratipalake amaka iyatakaiyo utkrsta binimaya pradana karaiba. Arasye ami amara pratipalakara prati agrahi.
68|33|E'idarae'i haya sasti arau akhiraatara sasti arau danara, yadi sihamte janilehemtena.
68|34|Niscaya muttakbisakalara babe te'omlokara pratipalakara ocarata ache niyamatapurna jannata.
68|35|Ami muchalima (anugata)sakalaka aparaadhisakalara darae ganya karaima neki
68|36|tomalokara ki haiche, tomaloke e'ito kenekuraa sid'dhanta karaa
68|37|tomalokara ocarata kono puthi ache neki ya’ta tomaloke adhyayana karaa
68|38|ye, niscaya tomalokara babe tata enekuraa bastu ache yi tomaloke pachanda karaa
68|39|athaba tomalokara babe amara lagata kiyamata paryanta balabat thaka enekuraa kono angikara ache neki ye, tomaloke nijara babe yitorae phayacala karaiba se'itorae paba
68|40|tumi sihamtaka sodha, sihamtara majata e'i dabira jim'madara kona
68|41|athaba sihamtara babe (allahara lagata) bahuto ansidara ache neki? Ache yadi tente sihamte sihamtara ansidarasakalaka upasthita karaka—yadi sihamta satyabadi haya.
68|42|Se'idina bharaira kalaphuli unmocita karaa ha’ba, se'idina sihamtaka mata ha’ba chajadaha karaibalai, kintu sihamta saksama naha’ba

68|43|sihamtara drstisamuha aranata arasthata thakiba, apamane sihamtaka acchanna karaiba athaca yetiya sihamta niraapada achila tetiya sihamtaka mata haichila chajada karaibalai (kintu sihamte chajada karaa nachila).
68|44|Eteka erai diya moka arau sihamtaka yisakale e'i bani pratyakhyana karae. Ami sihamtaka lahe lahe enekai dharaima ye, sihamte game'i napaba.
68|45|Arau ma'i sihamtaka arakasa dima. Niscaya mora kausala atyanta balistha.
68|46|Tumi sihamtara ocarata paraisramika (binimaya) dabi karaicha neki, yara phalata sihamte rnara karane bharaakraanta hai paraiche
68|47|ne sihamtara ocarata gayebara jnana ache, yito sihamte likhi raakhe
68|48|eteke tumi tomara pratipalakara adesara apeksata dhairya dharana karaa, arau tumi machara garaakira darae naha’ba, yetiya te'om bisada acchanna arasthata ahbana karaichila.
68|49|Yadi te'omra pratipalakara anugraha te'omra ocarata ahi napalehemtena, tente te'om lanchita arasthata unmukta praantarata niksipta ha’lehemtena.
68|50|Tara pichata te'omra pratipalake te'omka manonita karaile arau te'omka satkarmaparaayanasakalara antarbhukta karaile.
68|51|Arau kaphirasakale yetiya upadesabani (kora'ana) sune tetiya sihamte enekuraa drstirae tomara phale caya yeniba tomaka bagaraa'i diba, arau sihamte kaya, ‘niscaya e'om ejana unmada (baliya)’.
68|52|Athaca e'i kora'ana kerala bisbabasira babe upadesa.
69|1|Se'i arasyambharai ghatana, (kiyamata)
69|2|ki se'i arasyambharai ghatana
69|3|arau kihe tomaka janaba se'i arasyambharai ghatanatono ki
69|4|chamuda arau ada sampradaye mithyaraopa karaichila bhitiprada mahabipadaka.
69|5|Seye chamuda sampradayaka dhbansa karaa haichila eta pralayankara biparyayakarai pracanda sabdara dbaraa.
69|6|Arau ada sampradayaka dhbansa karaa haichila thanda prabala dhumuha batahara dbaraa

69|7|iyaka te'om sata raati arau atha dina abiraamabharae sihamtara oparata prabahita karaichila; phalata tumi ukta sampradayaka dekhibalai palahemtena---ye sihamta enekai sicaraita hai parai ache yene sarasun'ya khejura gachara kandahe.
69|8|Iyara pichata sihamtara babe tumi kiba arasista dekhibalai poraane
69|9|arau phira'a'una, tara purbarartisakale lagate olota'i diya janapadabasiye jaghan'ya papa kamata lipta achila.
69|10|Arau sihamte nija pratipalakara raachulaka aman'ya karaichila, phalata te'om sihamtaka atyanta kathorabharae graeptara karaile.
69|11|Yetiya banapani bipadasima ceraa'i gaichila niscaya tetiya ami tomalokaka naramta araohana karaa'ichilo.
69|12|Ami e'ito karaichilo tomalokaka eta smaraniya siksa diyara babe arau e'i babe ye, yate srautidhara kane iyaka samraksana karai raakhe.
69|13|Eteke yetiya sinata phu diya ha’ba—kerala eta phu.
69|14|Arau prthiraisaha parbatasamuhaka utha'i niya ha’ba arau matra eta aghatata e'ibora curna-bicurna hai yaba.
69|15|Phalata se'idina mahaghatana sanghatita ha’ba.
69|16|Arau akasa bidirna hai yaba, phalata se'idina i durbala-biksipta hai paraiba.
69|17|Arau phiraistasakala akasara bibhinna praantata thakiba. Se'idina athajana phiraista'i tomara pratipalakara arachaka bahana karaiba.
69|18|Se'idina tomalokaka upasthita karaoraa ha’ba lagate tomalokara kono gopaniyata'i arau gopana nathakiba.
69|19|Tetiya yara amalanama tara som hatata diya ha’ba si ka’ba, ‘loraa, mora amalanama parhi coraa’.
69|20|‘Mora drrha bisbasa achila ye, ma'i mora hicapara sanmukhina hama’.
69|21|Seye te'om santosajanaka jirana-yapana karaiba.
69|22|Su'ucca jannatata
69|23|yara phala-mula nice'i ocarata olami thakiba.
69|24|(Koraa ha’ba) ‘bigata dinasamuhata tomaloke agalai yi praerana karaichila tara binimayata tomaloke trpti sahakarae khoraa arau pana karaa’.
69|25|Kintu yara amalanama ba'om hatata diya ha’ba si ka’ba, ‘haya, moka yadi mora amalanama nidilehemtena’
69|26|‘arau yadi ma'i najanilohemtena mora hicapa
69|27|‘haya, mora mrtyurae'i yadi mora curanta phayacala ha’lehemtena
69|28|‘mora dhana-sampada mora kono kamata nahila.
69|29|‘Mora ksamata sakti'o binasta haiche’.
69|30|(Phiraistasakalaka koraa ha’ba) ‘dharaa taka arau galata pagha laga'i diya’.
69|31|‘Tara pichata taka jahannamata niksepa karaa’.
69|32|Tara pichata taka bandhi thoraa ene edala sikalirae yara dairgha sattara hata.
69|33|Niscaya si mahana allahara prati imana posana karaa nachila
69|34|arau michakinaka khadyadanata utsahita karaa'o nachila.
69|35|Eteke aji iyata tara kono antaranga bandhu nathakiba.
69|36|Arau ksata-nihsrta pumjara bahirae ana kono khadya nathakiba
69|37|yito aparaadhisakalara bahirae ana kone'o nakhaba.
69|38|Eteke ma'i sapata karao se'ibora bastura yibora tomaloke dekha poraa
69|39|arau tarao sapata karao yibora tomaloke dekha noporaa
69|40|niscaya eya (kora'ana) eka sanmanita raachulara (bahita) bani.
69|41|Arau eya kono kabira katha nahaya; tomaloke khube'i kama imana posana karaa.
69|42|Arau eya kono ganakara katha'o nahaya; tomaloke khube'i kama upadesa grahana karaa.
69|43|Eya bisbajagatara pratipalakara taraphara paraa nayilakrta.
69|44|Yadi te'om amara namata kono micha racana karailehemtena
69|45|tente niscaya ami taka som haterae dharailohemtena
69|46|tara pichata ami tara hrdapindara siraa kati dilohemtena
69|47|eteke tomalokara majata ene kono na'i, yiye taka raksa karaiba.
69|48|Arau eya (kora'ana) to muttakbisakalara babe niscita eta upadesa.
69|49|Arau ami niscaya jano ye, tomalokara majata kichumana mithyaraopakarai ache.
69|50|Arau e'ito (kora'ana) niscaya kaphirasakalara babe eka niscita anusocanara karana.
69|51|Arau niscaya e'ito suniscita satya.
69|52|Eteke tumi tomara mahana pratipalakara namata tachabiha patha karaa.
70|1|Byakti ejane abedana karaile, ene sasti samparke yito apatita ha’ba
70|2|kaphirasakalara oparata, yara kono pratiraodhakarai na'i.
70|3|E'ito ahiba allahara taraphara paraa, yijana urdhbaraohanara khatakhatiborara (jakhala) adhikarai
70|4|phiraistasakala arau rauha ene eta dinata allahara dise urd'dhagami haya, yara paraimana pancasa hajara bachara.
70|5|Eteke tumi dhairya dharana karaa parama dhairya.
70|6|Sihamte e'i dinaka bahu durata thaka buli bharae.
70|7|Arau ami iyaka nice'i ocarata dekhi acho.
70|8|Se'idina akasa hai yaba galita dhatura darae
70|9|arau parbatasamuha hai yaba rana-biranara unara darae
70|10|arau kono antaranga bandhurae antaranga bandhura kha-khabara nusudhiba
70|11|sihamtaka ijane-sijanara drstigocara karaoraa ha’ba. Aparaadhiye se'idinara sastira binimayata diba bicaraiba tara santana-santatika
70|12|arau tara strai arau bhatrka
70|13|arau tara jati-gosthika, yisakale taka asraya dichila
70|14|arau prthiraita yisakala ache se'i sakaloke, yate e'i binimaye taka mukti diye.
70|15|Ketiya'o nahaya, niscaya e'ito lelihana ju'i
70|16|yiye murara chala khaha'i pelaba.
70|17|Jahanname se'i byaktika matiba, yiye satyara prati prstha pradarsana karaichila arau mukha ghuraa'i laichila.
70|18|Arau sampada sancaya karaichila arau se'ibora samraksana karai raakhichila.
70|19|Niscaya manuhaka srsti karaa haiche atisaya dhairyahina asthiracittaraupe.
70|20|Yetiya taka bipade sparsa karae tetiya si atimatraa utkanthita hai parae.
70|21|Arau yetiya taka kalyane sparsa karae tetiya si atisaya krpana hai parae.
70|22|Kintu chalata pratisthakaraisakalara bahirae
70|23|yisakale nija chalatara ksetrata sadaya pratisthita
70|24|arau yisakalara dhana-sampadata nirdharaita hakba ache
70|25|khojaniya-maganiya arau bancitasakalara babe
70|26|arau yisakale pratiphala dirasaka satya buli bisbasa karae.
70|27|Arau yisakale nija pratipalakara sasti samparke bhita-santrasta
70|28|niscaya te'omlokara pratipalakara sastira paraa niraapada hai thaka nayaya
70|29|arau yisakale nijara yaunangasamuhara hiphajatakarai
70|30|kintu sihamtara patni athaba adhikarabhukta dasira bahirae, ene ksetrata sihamta nindaniya naha’ba
70|31|kintu yisakale e'omlokara bahirae anaka kamana karae, sihamte'i simalanghanakarai.
70|32|Arau yisakale nijara amanata arau pratisrauti raksa karae
70|33|arau yisakale nija saksyadanata atala
70|34|arau yisakale nijara chalatara hiphajata karae
70|35|te'omloke'i jannatasamuhata sanmanita ha’ba.
70|36|Kaphirasakalara ki ha’la, sihamte dekhuna tomara phale dhapaliya'i ahi ache
70|37|som phalara paraa arau ba'om phalara paraa, dale dale.
70|38|Sihamtara pratyeke'i e'ito asa karae neki ye, taka praacuryamaya jannatata praraesa karaoraa ha’ba
70|39|ketiya'o nahaya, niscaya sihamtaka yitorae srsti karaicho seya sihamte jane.
70|40|Eteke ma'i sapata karaicho udayasthala arau astacalasamuhara pratipalakara, arasye ami saksama
70|41|sihamtatakai utkrstasakalaka sihamtara sthalararti karaibalai, arau ene karaata ami aksama nahaya.
70|42|Eteke sihamtaka nirarthaka katha-bataraa arau khela-dhemalita matta hai thakibalai diya-- yi dinara pratisrauti sihamtaka diya haiche se'i dinara sanmukhina nohoraa paryanta.
70|43|Se'idina sihamta kabarara paraa drautabegata ola'i ahiba, ene lagiba yeniba sihamte kono laksyasthalara phale dhabita haiche
70|44|sihamtara drstisamuha aranata arasthata thakiba, apamane sihamtaka acchanna karaiba e'itorae se'idina yara bisaye sihamtaka satarka karaa haichila.
71|1|Niscaya ami nuhaka te'omra sampradayara prati e'i nirdesasaha praerana karaichilo ye, ‘sihamtara ocarata yantranadayaka sasti ahara purbe tumi sihamtaka satarka karai diya’.
71|2|Te'om ka’le, ‘he mora sampradaya! Niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe spasta satarkakarai
71|3|‘e'i bisaye ye, tomaloke allahara ibadata karaa arau te'omra takbaraa aralambana karaa, arau mora anugatya karaa

71|4|te'om tomalokara babe tomalokara papasamuha ksama karaiba arau tomalokaka eta nirdista samaya paryanta arakasa diba. Niscaya allahara nirdharaita samaya upasthita ha’le seya (ketiya'o) bilamba karaa nahaya; yadi tomaloke e'ito janilahemtena!’
71|5|Te'om ka’le, ‘he mora pratipalaka! Niscaya ma'i mora sampradayaka dine raatiye ahbana karaicho
71|6|‘kintu mora ahbanata sihamtara amtarai yoraatohe brd'dhi pa'iche’.

71|7|Arau yetiya'i ma'i sihamtaka ahbana karaicho yate tumi sihamtaka ksama karaa, sihamte nijara kanata anulirae sopa diche arau kaporaerae nijake dhaki laiche, arau amkoragomja hai thakiche lagate ati dambhikatarae aud'dhatya prakasa karaiche.
71|8|‘Tara pichato ma'i sihamtaka prakasya ahbana karaicho
71|9|‘akau sihamtaka ma'i prakasya arau ati gopaniyabharae'o ahbana karaicho’.
71|10|Arau kaicho, tomalokara pratipalakara ocarata ksama praarthana karaa, niscaya te'om mahaksamasila
71|11|te'om tomalokara babe pracura paraimane barasuna barsaba
71|12|‘arau tomalokaka dhana-sampada arau santana-santati pradana karai sahaya karaiba arau tomalokara babe udyana sthapana karaiba arau nada-nadi prabahita karaiba.
71|13|Tomalokara ki ha'la, tomaloke allahara sraesthatba upalabdhi nakaraa kiya
71|14|‘Athaca teraemi tomalokaka srsti karaiche paryayakrame.
71|15|Tomaloke laksya karaa na'ine, allahe kenekai starae starae satakhana akasa srsti karaiche
71|16|arau e'iborara majata candraka srsti karaiche pohara hicape arau suryaka bana'iche pradipa.
71|17|‘Arau allahe tomalokaka matira paraa udbhuta karaiche
71|18|‘tara pichata te'om tomalokaka talai ubhata'i niba arau niscitabharae tomalokaka punaraut'thita karaiba
71|19|‘arau allahe prthiraikhanaka tomalokara babe bistrta karaiche
71|20|‘yate tomaloke tata prasasta pathata calacala karaiba paraa’.
71|21|Nuhe ka’le, ‘he mora pratipalaka! Sihamte moka aman'ya karaiche arau ene lokara anusarana karaiche yara dhana-sampada arau santana-santatiye kerala tara ksatihe brd'dhi karaiche’.
71|22|Arau sihamte bhayaraha sarayantra karaiche
71|23|arau sihamte kaiche, ‘tomaloke ketiya'o tomalokara upasyasakalaka barjana nakaraiba; arau paraityaga nakaraiba adda, churaa'a, iyagucha, iya'ukba arau nacharaka’.
71|24|‘Niscaya sihamte bahulokaka pathabhrasta karaiche, arau (he allaha) tumi yalimasakalara babe bhrastatara bahirae ana eko brd'dhi nakaraiba’.
71|25|Sihamtara aparaadhara babe sihamtaka duba'i diya ha’la tara pichata sihamtaka ju'ita praraesa karaoraa ha’la, eteke sihamte allahara bahirae ana kako sahayakarai hicape poraa nachila.
71|26|Arau nuhe ka’le, ‘he mora pratipalaka! Prthiraira kaphirasakalara majara paraa kono grhabasika arasista naraakhiba.
71|27|‘Yadi tumi sihamtaka arasista raakha tente sihamte tomara bandasakalaka pathabhrasta karaiba arau sihamte kerala duskrtikarai kaphirakahe janma diba.

71|28|He mora pratipalaka! Moka arau mora pitr-matrka arau yiye muminahai mora gharata praraesa karaiba lagate mumina purausa arau mumina naraisakalaka ksama karai diya; arau yalimasakalara babe dhbansara bahirae ana eko brd'dhi nakaraiba’.
72|1|Koraa, mora prati ahi nayila haiche ye, niscaya jinasakalara eta dale manoyoga sahakarae suniche; tara pichata kaiche, ‘niscaya ami eka bismayakara kora'ana sunicho
72|2|‘yito satyara patha dekhuraaya seye ami tara oparata imana anicho. Gatike ami ketiya'o amara pratipalakara lagata ana kako ansi buli ganya nakaraima
72|3|‘arau niscaya amara pratipalakara maryada su'ucca’ te'om kono sangini arau kono santano grahana karaa na'i.
72|4|‘Arau amara majara nirbodhasakale allahara bisaye abastara katha-bataraa kaichila’.
72|5|‘Athaca ami dharana karaichilo ye, manuha arau jina jatiye ketiya'o allaha samparke micha araopa nakaraiba.
72|6|‘Arau niscaya kichumana manuhe kichumana jinara asraya laichila, phalata sihamte jinasakalara ahankara brd'dhi karaichila’.
72|7|‘Arau niscaya sihamte'o dharana karaichila yenekai tomaloke dharana karaicha ye, allahe kako ketiya'o punaraut'thita nakaraiba’.
72|8|‘Arau niscaya ami akasara tathya sangraha karaiba bicaraichilo, kintu ami dekhilo ye, akasakhana kathora praharai arau ulkapindara dbaraa paraipurna

72|9|‘arau ami agate akasara bibhinna ghamtita sambada sunara babe bahichilo kintu etiya konoba'i sambada sunibalai bicaraile si tara oparata niksepara babe prastuta jalanta ulkapindara sanmukhina haya.
72|10|‘Arau niscaya ami najano ye, prthiraibasira babe amangala bicaraa haiche, ne sihamtara pratipalake sihamtara mangala bicaraiche.
72|11|Arau niscaya amara majara kichumana haiche satkarmasila arau kichumana iyara byatikrama, ami achilo bibhinna pathara anusarai
72|12|‘arau ami buji pa'icho ye, ami prthiraita ketiya'o allahaka aparaga karaiba noraaraima arau palayana karai'o te'omka byartha karaiba noraaraima.
72|13|‘Arau niscaya ami yetiya hidayatara bani sunilo, tetiya tara prati imana anilo. Eteke yi byakti tara pratipalakara prati imana aniba, tara kono ksati arau kono an'yayara asanka nathakiba.
72|14|‘Arau niscaya amara majata ache kichu sankhyaka atmasamarpanakarai arau kichu sankhyaka ache simalanghanakarai; eteke yisakale ichalama grahana karaiche sihamte'i sathika patha bachi laiche.
72|15|‘Arau yisakala simalanghanakarai, sihamte'i haiche jahannamara indhana’.
72|16|Arau yadi sihamte sathika pathata abicala thakilehemtena, teneha’le ami niscaya sihamtaka pracura paraimane pani pana karaalohemtena
72|17|yate ami iyara dbaraa sihamtaka paraiksa karaiba parao; arau yiye nija pratipalakara smaranara paraa mukha ghuraa'i laya, taka te'om kathina sastita praraesa karaaba.
72|18|Arau niscaya machajidasamuha allahara babe'i, gatike tomaloke allahara lagata ana kako namatiba.
72|19|Arau niscaya yetiya allahara banda'i te'omka praarthana karaibalai thiya dile, tetiya sihamte te'omra ocarata ahi bhira karaile.
72|20|Koraa, ‘ma'i kerala mora pratipalakake'i ahbana karao arau te'omra lagata ana kako ansi nakarao’.
72|21|Koraa, ‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara kono ksati arau kalyanara malika nahaya’.
72|22|Koraa, niscaya allahara paraa kone'o moka raksa karaiba noraaraiba arau te'omra bahirae ma'i ketiya'o kono asraya napama.

72|23|‘Kerala allahara taraphara paraa te'omra raichalatara bani pracara karaatorae mora dayitba. Arau yiye allaha arau te'omra raachulaka aman'ya karaiba tara babe ache jahannamara ju'i, tata sihamte cirakala thakiba’.

72|24|Arasesata yetiya sihamte iyaka pratyaksa karaiba, yi bisaye sihamtaka saradhana karaa haichila. Tetiya sihamte janibalai paba ye, sahayakarai hicape kona bechi durbala arau sankhyata kona ata'itakai kama.
72|25|Koraa, ‘ma'i najano tomalokaka yitora pratisrauti diya haiche, se'ito nikatararti ne mora pratipalake iyara babe kono dirgha myada nirdharana karaiba’.
72|26|Te'om adrsya bisayara jnani, arau te'om nijara adrsyara jnana karao ocarata prakasa nakarae
72|27|Kintu te'omra manonita raachulara bahirae. Tene ksetrata allahe te'omra raachulara sanmukhata arau pichata praharai niyukta karae

72|28|yate te'om prakasa karae ye, niscaya te'omloke te'omlokara pratipalakara raichalata paumca'i diche. Arau te'omlokara ocarata yi ache seya te'om jnanara dbaraa paraibestana karai raakhiche arau te'om pratito bastu ganana karai hicapa karai raakhiche.
73|1|He bastraabrta
73|2|raati chalata adaya karaa, kichu ansara bahirae
73|3|adha raati ba tatokai alapa kama
73|4|athaba tatokai alapa bechi. Arau spastabharae dhirae dhirae kora'ana tilaraata karaa.
73|5|Niscaya ami tomara prati eti gadhura bani aratirna karaima.
73|6|Niscaya raati-jagarana atmasanyamara babe adhika prabala arau bakasphuranata adhika upayogi.
73|7|Niscaya dinara bhagata tomara babe ache dirgha karmabyastata.
73|8|Arau tumi tomara pratipalakara nama smarana karaa arau ekanisthabharae te'omra prati manonibesa karaa.
73|9|Teraemi pura arau pascimara raba, te'omra bahirae ana kono (satya) ilaha na'i. Eteke te'omke'i tumi karya sampadanakarairaupe grahana karaa.
73|10|Arau manuhe yi kaya tara oparata tumi dhairya dharana karaa arau saujan'yara saite sihamtaka paraihara karai cala.
73|11|Arau bilasa samagraira adhikarai mithyaraopakaraisakalaka molai erai diya arau sihamtaka kichu samaya arakasa diya.
73|12|Niscaya amara ocarata ache sikalisamuha arau prajbalita ju'i
73|13|arau ache ka'itayukta khadya arau yantranadayaka sasti.
73|14|Yidina prthirai arau parbatasamuha prakampita ha’ba arau parbatasamuha biksipta calamana balimayata parainata ha’ba.
73|15|Niscaya ami tomalokara babe saksi sbaraupe tomalokara ocarata raachula praerana karaicho yenekai phira'a'unara ocarata raachula praerana karaichilo.
73|16|Kintu phira'a'une raachulaka aman'ya karaiche, seye ami taka sasti bihicho.
73|17|Eteke tomaloke yadi kupharai karaa tente tomaloke se'i dinatota kenekai atma raksa karaiba yi dirase sisusakalaka brd'dhata parainata karaiba
73|18|Se'i dina akasakhana bidirna ha’ba, te'omra pratisrauti bastabayita ha’ba.
73|19|Niscaya e'ito eta upadesa, eteke yiye iccha karae si nija pratipalakara patha aralambana karaka.

73|20|Niscaya tomara pratipalake jane ye, tumi chalatara babe thiya diya ketiyaba raatira praaya du'i-trtiyansata, ketiyaba ardhansata arau ketiyaba eka-trtiyansata arau tomara lagata thakasakalara eta dale'o thiya diye. Arau allahe'i nirdharana karae dina arau raatira paraimana. Te'om jane ye, tomaloke iyara sathika nirdharana palana karaiba noraaraiba, seye te'om tomalokaka ksama karaile. Eteke tomaloke kora'anara paraa yimanakhini sahaja haya simanakhini patha karaa. Te'om jane ye, tomalokara majara kichumana asustha hai paraiba, akau kichumane allahara anugraha sandhana karaibalai bhramana karaiba arau ana kichumane allahara pathata yud'dharata arasthata thakiba. Seye tomaloke kora'anara paraa yimanakhini sahaja haya se'ikhini patha karaa; arau tomaloke chalata pratistha karaa arau yakata pradana karaa lagate allahaka uttama rna pradana karaa. Tomalokara nijara mangalara babe tomaloke yi agatiyakai praerana karaiba seya allahara ocarata paba. I utkrstatama arau puraskara hicape bara mahat. Allahara ocarata ksama praarthana karai thaka; niscaya allaha ksamasila, parama dayalu.

74|28|i eko arasista naraakhiba arau erai'o nidiba.

Enekai allahe yaka iccha pathabhrasta karae arau yaka iccha take'i hidayata pradana karae; arau tomara pratipalakara sain'yabahini samparke te'omra bahirae ana konorae najane; arau jahannamara e'i udaharana manuhara babe eta upadesa matra.

76|10|Niscaya ami amara pratipalakara taraphara paraa eta bhayankara bhitiprada dirasara bhaya posana karao’.
76|11|Phalata allahe sihamtaka raksa karaiba se'i dinara anistara paraa arau sihamtaka pradana karaiba ujjbalata arau utphullata.
76|12|Arau sihamtara dhairyara puraskarasbaraupe te'om sihamtaka pradana karaiba udyana arau raecami bastra.
76|13|Tata sihamte susajjita asanata a'uji bahi thakiba, tata sihamte prakhara garama arau atyadhika sito anubhara nakaraiba.
76|14|Sihamtara oparata sannihita thakiba udyanara cham arau iyara phalamulara thokabora sihamtara sampurna ayattadhina karaa ha’ba.
76|15|Arau sihamtaka ghurai ghurai paraibesana karaa ha’ba raupara patrata arau phatikara darae sbaccha pana patrata
76|16|raupara subhra phatika patra, sihamte iyara paraimana karaiba sampurna paraimitabharae.
76|17|Arau tata sihamtaka pana karaoraa ha’ba sukana adara misraita purnapatra-paniya
76|18|Jannatara enekuraa eta nijaraa yara nama ha’ba chalachabila.
76|19|Arau sihamtara carai'ophale pradaksina karaiba cira kisorasakale; yetiya tumi sihamtaka dekhiba tomara ene lagiba yena sihamta biksipta mukuta.
76|20|Arau tumi yetiya tata dekhiba, dekhibalai paba sbacchandya arau biraata samraajya.

76|21|Sihamtara ararana ha’ba suksma se'ujiya raecama arau mota raecami pochaka arau sihamta alankrta ha’ba rauperae nirmita gamakharaurae, arau sihamtara pratipalake sihamtaka paraitra paniya pana karaaba.
76|22|Niscaya e'itorae tomalokara puraskara; arau tomalokara karmapracesta achila prasansayogya.
76|23|Niscaya ami tomara prati paryayakrame ala-kora'ana aratirna karaicho.
76|24|Eteke tumi dhairyara saite tomara pratipalakara nirdesara pratiksa karaa arau sihamtara majara paraa kono papistha ba ghora akrtajna kaphirara anugatya nakaraiba.
76|25|Arau puraa-gadhuli tomara pratipalakara nama smarana karaa.
76|26|Arau raatira ekansata te'omra prati chajadaranata horaa arau raatira dirgha samaya te'omra paraitrata ghosana arau tachabiha patha karaa.
76|27|Niscaya sihamta prthiraira jiranaka bhala paya arau sihamte sihamtara sanmukhara kathina dinatoka upeksa karae.
76|28|Amiye'i sihamtaka srsti karaicho arau sihamtara gathana sudrrha karaicho. Arau ami yetiya iccha karaima tetiya'i sihamtara sthanata sihamtara darae (karaobaka) ani paraibartana karai dima.
76|29|Niscaya e'ito eta upadesa; eteke yiye iccha karae si yena tara pratipalakara phale yoraara patha bachi laya.
76|30|Arau allahe iccha nakaraile tomaloke iccha karaibalai saksama naha’ba; niscaya allaha mahajnani, prajnamaya.
76|31|Te'om yaka iccha take'i nija rahamatara antarbhukta karae, arau yalimasakalara babe te'om prastuta karai raakhiche yantranadayaka sasti.
77|1|Sapata kalyanasbaraupa praeraita batahara
77|2|tara pichata pracanda begata prabahita dhumuhara
77|3|sapata pracanda sancalanakaraira
77|4|tara pichata suspastaraupe parthakyakaraira
77|5|Tara pichata sihamtara, yisakale manuhara antarata upadesa paumca'i diye
77|6|ojara-apatti duraikarana arau satarka karaara babe
77|7|niscaya tomalokaka yi pratisrauti diya haiche seya arasye sanghatita ha’ba.
77|8|Yetiya naksatraraaji alohina ha’ba
77|9|arau yetiya akasakhana bidirna karaa ha’ba
77|10|arau yetiya parbatasamuhaka curnabicurna karaa ha’ba
77|11|arau yetiya raachulasakalaka nirdharaita samayata upasthita karaa ha’ba
77|12|konato dinara babe e'ibora sthagita rakha haiche
77|13|bicara dinara babe.
77|14|Arau kihe tomaka janaba bicara dirasa ki
77|15|se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe.
77|16|Ami purbarartisakalaka dhbansa karaa na'ine
77|17|tara pichata parabartisakalako sihamtara anugami banama.
77|18|Aparaadhibilakara lagata ami enekuraa acarane'i karao.
77|19|Se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe.
77|20|Ami tomalokaka ghrnaniya panira paraa srsti karaa na'ine
77|21|tara pichata ami iyaka niraapada sthanata suraksita karai raakhicho
77|22|eta nirdista samaya laike
77|23|tara pichata ami paraimapa karaicho, eteke ami kimana nipuna paraimapakarai
77|24|se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe.
77|25|Ami prthiraikhanaka dharanakarairaupe srsti karaa na'ine
77|26|jiraitasakala arau mrtasakalara babe
77|27|arau ami tata sthapana karaicho sudrrha arau su'ucca parbatasamuha arau tomalokaka pana karaa'icho trsna nibaranakarai mitha upayogi pani.
77|28|Se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe.
77|29|(Sihamtaka koraa ha’ba) tomaloke yaka asbikara karaichila, etiya gati karaa taraphale.
77|30|Yoraa tinita sakha bisista ju'ira chamra pine
77|31|yito cham sitala nahaya arau i agnisikhara paraa raksa'o nakaraiba
77|32|niscaya jahanname utksepana karaiba brhat atraalika sadrsa phirainati
77|33|enekuraa yena haladhiya utara sraeni
77|34|se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe.
77|35|E'ito enekuraa dina yidina sihamte katha ka’ba noraaraiba
77|36|arau sihamtaka ajuhata peca karaara anumati'o diya naha’ba.
77|37|Se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe.
77|38|‘E'ito phayacalara dina ami ekatraita karaicho tomalokaka arau purbarartisakalaka’.
77|39|Eteke yadi tomalokara kono kausala ache tente prayoga karaa mora biraud'dhe.
77|40|Se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe.
77|41|Niscaya muttakbisakala thakiba chamra talata arau nijaraa bahula sthanata
77|42|arau sihamtara hempaha anuyayi phalamulara majata.
77|43|(Sihamtaka koraa ha'ba) tomaloke yi amala karaichila tara pratidanasbaraupe trptira saite panahara karaa
77|44|satkarmasilasakalaka ami enekuraa'i pratidana di thako.
77|45|Se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe.
77|46|(He kaphirasakala!) Tomaloke ahara karaa arau bhoga karaa khantekara babe; niscaya tomaloka aparaadhi.
77|47|Se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe.
77|48|Yetiya sihamtaka koraa haya, ‘rauku’ karaa sihamte rauku’ nakarae’.
77|49|Se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe.
77|50|Eteke kora'anara paraibarte sihamte arau kona banira prati imana aniba
